name: Godot Ranger Gets The Gems
description: I'm rather pleased with myself. I throw this together this weekend. I didn't use any tutorials or guides. I just took my pervious knowledge from previous project and made a rudimentary game. It's a basic game but an application of applying existing knowledge to a new thing. I used existing assets from opengameart.org but the code and everything else is my work. I'm happy with it. I feel like I managed to apply knowledge rather than being guided by a video/teacher (not that there is anything wrong with videos/teachers, just glad to do it on my own for once).
